Diamonds are the hardest material I know, with a construct of this material I should be able to pulverize all types of Ingots, Ores and Crystals. In order to do this I designed a automated mill.
I build a diamond-studded grinder and combined it with a computer system to speed it up and prevent the wear of the expensive grinder.
Furthermore I can duplicate the yield of ores by pulverizing them. This can also used to refine crystal without coal, logically the Dusts must be smelted into the Ingots in a second step.
